name: Aroma Bliss
text:
Appetizer
Masala Papad
Crispy fried Papad topped with a zesty mix of chopped onions, tomatoes, coriander, and spices. A perfect crunchy and flavorful starter!
$4.99

Roasted Papad
Crispy and flavorful, roasted papad is the perfect crunchy snack to elevate any meal.
$2.99

Fry Papad
Golden and crisp, fried papads adds a delightful crunch to your plate with every bite.
$2.99

Cactus cut potato with tandoori dip
Crispy, thinly sliced cactus-cut potatoes seasoned to perfection, served with a tangy and spiced tandoori dip. A bold and zesty appetizer!
$12.99

Chicken Tandoori
Flavorful Indian dish of marinated chicken roasted in a tandoor, bursting with smoky, spicy goodness.
Half $16.99
Full $22.99

Chicken Malai Tikka
Chicken Malai Tikka - creamy, tender grilled chicken with subtle spices.
$17.99

Paneer Tikka Masala
Paneer Tikka Masala - spiced grilled paneer in a rich, tangy tomato gravy.
$16.99

Veg Curries
Karai Paneer
Savor the rich flavors of soft paneer cubes in a spicy tomato gravy, enhanced with bell peppers and onions. Served sizzling hot in a traditional karahi, perfect with naan or rice.
$16.99

Paneer Bhurji
Scrambled cottage cheese cooked with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices, served hot. A flavorful North Indian delight, perfect with roti, Naan.
$16.99

Paneer butter masala
Soft cottage cheese cubes simmered in a rich, creamy tomato gravy infused with aromatic spices, butter, and fresh cream. A classic North Indian delicacy, best enjoyed with naan or steamed rice.
$16.99

Paneer kaju masala
A rich and creamy North Indian delicacy featuring soft paneer cubes and crunchy cashews simmered in a luscious, spiced tomato-based gravy. A perfect blend of flavors and textures, served with fresh herbs. Pairs perfectly with naan or rice.
$16.99

Paneer lavabdar
A rich and creamy North Indian delicacy featuring soft paneer cubes simmered in a luscious tomato-based gravy, infused with aromatic spices, butter, and cashews. Served with a touch of cream for an indulgent experience. Perfect with naan or rice!
$16.99

Veg jaipuri
A delightful medley of fresh vegetables cooked in a rich, aromatic gravy with a perfect blend of Rajasthani spices. The vibrant and flavorful dish offers a royal taste, capturing the essence of Jaipur's culinary heritage. Served with your choice of Indian bread or rice.
$16.99

Deluxe Curries
Paneer Patiala
A flavorful and spicy scrambled cottage cheese dish cooked with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices, served hot. Perfect with roti, paratha, or pav, it's a must-try for paneer lovers with a touch of spinach gravy.
$17.99

Paneer Pasanda
A delicious medley of seasonal vegetables tossed in a rich, flavorful gravy, cooked on a hot tawa with aromatic spices. Served with fresh herbs and a hint of butter for an irresistible taste. Perfect with naan or rice!
$17.99

Malai Kofta (Sweet)
Creamy, flavorful dumplings made from fresh paneer and potatoes, simmered in a rich, aromatic gravy. A perfect blend of spices for a truly indulgent experience.
$17.99

Jafrani Kofta (Spicy)
Creamy, flavorful dumplings made from fresh paneer and potatoes, delicately spiced and simmered in a rich, flavorful gravy. A royal treat for your taste buds.
$17.99

Cheese Angoori
A creamy, flavorful curry with cheese, simmered in a rich, aromatic gravy. Served with tender, soft dumplings of cheese, this dish is a perfect blend of richness and spice.
$17.99

Veg Hyderabadi
Veg Hyderabadi
A flavorful and spicy scrambled cottage cheese dish cooked with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices, served hot. Perfect with roti, paratha, or pav, it's a must-try for paneer lovers with a touch of spinach gravy.
$16.99

Veg tawa masala
A delicious medley of seasonal vegetables tossed in a rich, flavorful gravy, cooked on a hot tawa with aromatic spices. Served with fresh herbs and a hint of butter for an irresistible taste. Perfect with naan or rice!
$16.99

Dal fry
A rich and flavorful lentil dish made with slow-cooked yellow lentils, tempered with aromatic spices, garlic, and butter. Garnished with fresh coriander and served hot. Perfect with steamed rice or Indian bread.
$14.99

Dal tadka
A classic North Indian dish made with yellow lentils simmered to perfection and topped with a flavorful tempering of ghee, cumin, garlic, and aromatic spices. This dish is a comforting blend of rich, earthy flavors. A perfect balance of spice and warmth, ideal for any occasion.
$14.99

Kathiyavadi
Dhaba Style Sev Tameta
A flavorful blend of tangy tomatoes cooked in aromatic spices, topped with crispy sev for the perfect crunch. A delightful and tangy treat for your taste buds!
$14.99

Kaju Kathiya
Crispy and savory, Kaju Gathiya is a traditional Indian snack made with a blend of chickpea flour and cashews, deep-fried to perfection. A delightful crunch in every bite!
$15.99

Dudh Sev Bhaji
A creamy and flavorful curry made with sev noodles, simmered in rich milk and aromatic spices. A comforting vegetarian dish, perfect with roti or rice.
$14.99

Lasaniya Bateka
Lasaniya Bateka is a flavorful dish made with crispy potato patties, smothered in a tangy, aromatic garlic and spice sauce. A perfect blend of crunch and zest in every bite!
$14.99

Kaju Lasan
Experience the perfect blend of rich, buttery cashews roasted to golden perfection and coated with aromatic garlic spices that awaken your taste buds. Kaju Lasan - a snack that's bold, crunchy, and unforgettable!
$14.99

Chicken Curries
Butter chicken
Creamy, spiced tomato gravy envelops tender chicken pieces, creating a rich and flavorful dish. Perfectly paired with naan or rice for a delicious meal.
$17.99

Karai chicken
Spicy chicken cooked with bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes in a rich blend of aromatic spices
$17.99

Chicken Tikka Masala
A symphony of smoky, tender chicken tossed in a rich, velvety sauce infused with bold spices and herbs - experience the classic comfort of Chicken Tikka Masala.
$17.99

Hakka Food
Veg Manchurian Dry
Crispy, golden-brown vegetable balls tossed in a savory, spicy Chinese-style sauce with a perfect balance of flavors. A delightful vegetarian appetizer for any occasion.
$14.99

Veg Manchurian Gravy
Crispy mixed vegetables cooked in a savory, tangy gravy with a perfect blend of spices. A delightful, flavorful dish that pairs beautifully with rice or noodles.
$15.99

Hakka Noodles
Savory stir-fried noodles tossed with fresh vegetables, aromatic spices, and a hint of soy sauce. A perfect balance of flavor and crunch!
$14.99

Fried Rice
Fragrant stir-fried rice tossed with fresh vegetables, eggs, and savory seasonings. A perfect blend of flavors for a satisfying meal!
$14.99

Chinese Bhel
Crispy noodles tossed with crunchy vegetables and zesty sauces, a perfect Indo-Chinese fusion snack. Spicy, tangy, and irresistibly delicious!
$14.99

Rice
Jeera Rice
Fragrant basmati rice tempered with cumin seeds, cooked to perfection for a light, aromatic side dish. A flavorful accompaniment to any curry or dish of your choice.
$8.99

Plain Rice
Steamed white rice, perfectly cooked to a light, fluffy texture. A simple and delicious side dish to complement any meal
$6.99

Roti
Tandoori Naan
Soft, fluffy Naan baked to perfection in a traditional clay tandoor, offering a rich, smoky flavor and a golden, buttery finish. Perfectly paired with any curry or enjoyed on its own!
$3.99

Butter Naan
Soft, fluffy butter naan baked to perfection in a traditional clay tandoor, offering a rich, smoky flavor and a golden, buttery finish. Perfectly paired with any curry or enjoyed on its own!
$3.99

Garlic Naan
Soft, fluffy garlic naan baked to perfection in a traditional clay tandoor, infused with aromatic garlic and butter for an authentic taste. A classic, warm accompaniment to any dish.
$4.49

Tandoori Roti
Tandoori roti is a traditional Indian flatbread cooked in a clay oven called a tandoor.
$2.99

Cheese Naan (AMUL CHEESE)
Soft and crispy flatbread, perfectly cooked on a hot griddle.
$5.99
